detectors.description:
Reentrancy in tool_fail.buggy_require() (test_inc.sol#20-24):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(a ++)()) (test_inc.sol#21)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- a = a + 1 (test_inc.sol#22)
	tool_fail.a (test_inc.sol#3) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- tool_fail.a (test_inc.sol#3)
	- tool_fail.buggy_require() (test_inc.sol#20-24)
	- tool_fail.buggy_require_3() (test_inc.sol#35-39)
	- tool_fail.buggy_require_4() (test_inc.sol#41-44)
	- tool_fail.buggy_single_statement_3() (test_inc.sol#26-28)
	- tool_fail.non_buggy1() (test_inc.sol#16-18)
	- tool_fail.non_buggy_local() (test_inc.sol#6-10)
	- tool_fail.non_buggy_require() (test_inc.sol#46-48)
	- tool_fail.non_buggy_single_statement() (test_inc.sol#12-14)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [tool_fail.buggy_require()](test_inc.sol#L20-L24):

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [a = a + 1](test_inc.sol#L22)
	[tool_fail.a](test_inc.sol#L3) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [tool_fail.a](test_inc.sol#L3)
	- [tool_fail.buggy_require()](test_inc.sol#L20-L24)
	- [tool_fail.buggy_require_3()](test_inc.sol#L35-L39)
	- [tool_fail.buggy_require_4()](test_inc.sol#L41-L44)
	- [tool_fail.buggy_single_statement_3()](test_inc.sol#L26-L28)
	- [tool_fail.non_buggy1()](test_inc.sol#L16-L18)
	- [tool_fail.non_buggy_local()](test_inc.sol#L6-L10)
	- [tool_fail.non_buggy_require()](test_inc.sol#L46-L48)
	- [tool_fail.non_buggy_single_statement()](test_inc.sol#L12-L14)
